subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: After a brief session Tuesday, N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and Derek Fisher, the union president, said only that they discussed “concepts” for a new labor deal, with talks to continue Wednesday.
snippet: After a brief session Tuesday, N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and Derek Fisher, the union president, said only that they discussed “concepts” for a new labor deal, with talks to continue Wednesday.
